name: svg.draggy.js
description: A JavaScript library for dragging SVG things.

scripts.deploy: cp src/svg.draggy.min.js example/js/svg.draggy.js && git commit -m 'Updated svg.draggy.js in the example dir' . && cp -r example ../_tmp && git checkout -B gh-pages && cp -r ../_tmp/* . && git add . -A && git commit -m 'Rebuild.' git push --all

author: jillix <contact@jillix.com>
